article_title: Zions Bancorp Sells Remainder of CDO Portfolio
article_text:
Zions Bancorp on Tuesday said it sold the remainder of its collateralized debt obligation securities, a type of bundled-debt investment that has plagued the regional lender.

During the second quarter, the Salt Lake City bank sold a total of $574 million of CDOs for proceeds of $437 million, resulting in a pretax loss of $137 million. Zions had previously said it had sold $81 million of CDOs through June 1, which is included in the...
